featured.text: They believe that some learners use one half of their brains more than the other half.
Left-brained learners usually concentrate on memorizing les and lists.
Mary is a typical left-brained learner.
Right-brained learners look for a general picture and concentrate on relating new information to what they already know.

definition.en_def: A person who is learning a subject or skill.
definition.example: The learner was eager to improve their language skills.
